entry.title: New virus cases on the rise in almost half of US states

media:group.media:title: New virus cases on the rise in almost half of US states
media:group.media:description: As states lift more restrictions and more Americans go out to socialize or protest, 22 US states are seeing higher rates of new coronavirus cases. #CNN #News

entry.title: Thousands mourn George Floyd's death at Houston memorial

media:group.media:title: Thousands mourn George Floyd's death at Houston memorial
media:group.media:description: CNN's Sara Sidner reports on the memorial in Houston, Texas, for George Floyd, an unarmed black man who was killed by Minneapolis police, prompting nationwide protests denouncing police brutality.

entry.title: LZ Granderson to Ben Carson: Just stop it. Get out of the way.

media:group.media:title: LZ Granderson to Ben Carson: Just stop it. Get out of the way.
media:group.media:description: ESPN reporter LZ Granderson reacts to Housing and Urban Development Secretary Dr. Ben Carson's comments during an interview with CNN's Jake Tapper on National Anthem protests.

entry.title: Ivanka Trump blames cancel culture for canceled commencement speech

media:group.media:title: Ivanka Trump blames cancel culture for canceled commencement speech
media:group.media:description: Wichita State University Tech, an affiliate of Wichita State University in Kansas, canceled Ivanka Trump's virtual graduation speech amid backlash over President Donald Trump's response to George Floyd's death and the nationwide protests. CNN's Briana Keilar speaks to a graduate of the school about the decision.

entry.title: CNN Poll: President Trump losing ground to Biden amid chaotic week

media:group.media:title: CNN Poll: President Trump losing ground to Biden amid chaotic week
media:group.media:description:
A new CNN Poll conducted by SSRS finds President Donald Trump's approval rating down 7 points in the last month as the President falls further behind presumptive Democratic nominee Joe Biden, whose support now stands at its highest level in CNN polling.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Democrats announce police and justice reform legislation

media:group.media:title: Democrats announce police and justice reform legislation
media:group.media:description:
Led by House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer and Congressional Black Caucus chair Karen Bass, Democrats announced police and justice reform legislation.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Trump takes aim at NFL after Roger Goodell encourages players to peacefully protest

media:group.media:title: Trump takes aim at NFL after Roger Goodell encourages players to peacefully protest
media:group.media:description:
President Donald Trump took aim at NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell following the NFL's announcement that players will be allowed to peacefully protest
#CNN #News

entry.title: UK protesters tear down slave trader statue, throw it in river

media:group.media:title: UK protesters tear down slave trader statue, throw it in river
media:group.media:description:
Anti-racism demonstrators in the UK tore down a statue of a 17th-century slave trader, rolled it through the streets and dumped it in the sea on Sunday, in a dramatic act of protest that has shone a spotlight on the country's stubborn colonial legacy.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Woman shot in face by police with rubber bullet: I want to know why

media:group.media:title: Woman shot in face by police with rubber bullet: I want to know why
media:group.media:description:
LaToya Ratlieff, who was shot in the face with a rubber bullet while protesting police brutality in Ft. Lauderdale, Florida, speaks to CNN's Alisyn Camerota about her experience.
#CNN #News

entry.title: How can ingrained attitudes result in racial injustice?

media:group.media:title: How can ingrained attitudes result in racial injustice?
media:group.media:description: Leading up to the death of George Floyd, long-simmering anger over enduring racial inequality helped bring the US to a boiling point. CNN's Tom Foreman takes a closer look. #CNN #News

entry.title: Colin Powell explains why Trump shouldn't be re-elected

media:group.media:title: Colin Powell explains why Trump shouldn't be re-elected
media:group.media:description:
Former Republican Secretary of State Colin Powell said Sunday that President Donald Trump has "drifted away" from the Constitution, adding to a growing list of former top military officials who have strongly criticized the President's response to the nationwide protests surrounding the police killing of George Floyd.
"We have a Constitution. And we have to follow that Constitution. And the President has drifted away from it," Powell, a retired general who served under President George W. Bush, told CNN's Jake Tapper on "State of the Union." The comments from Powell, the first African American secretary of state and chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, add to a growing list of rebukes made in recent days by former top officials who have expressed discontent with Trump's strongman approach to the protests sparked by the death of Floyd, a black man who was killed in late May by a white police officer in Minneapolis. #Powell #CNN #Tapper

entry.title: NYT editorial editor resigns after Tom Cotton op-ed backlash

media:group.media:title: NYT editorial editor resigns after Tom Cotton op-ed backlash
media:group.media:description: The editor of The New York Times' editorial page, James Bennet, has resigned, publisher A.G. Sulzberger announced Sunday. Bennet's resignation comes after the publication of a controversial op-ed from Republican Sen. Tom Cotton earlier in the week drew significant criticism, including from dozens of the newspaper's staffers. Sulzberger also said that Jim Dao, a deputy editorial page editor who had publicly taken responsibility as overseeing the editing of the piece, would be stepping off the masthead and reassigned to the newsroom. Katie Kingsbury, another deputy editorial page editor, will oversee the editorial page through the 2020 election. The tectonic restructuring capped a week of turmoil inside the nation's paper of record, with staff engaging in debate over the publication of Cotton's op-ed and grilling The Times' leadership over the process that led up to it. "While this has been a painful week across the company, it has sparked urgent and important conversations," Sulzberger wrote employees in the memo announcing the changes. #CNN #News

entry.title: Fareed slams GOP leaders as Trump's cheerful collaborators

media:group.media:title: Fareed slams GOP leaders as Trump's cheerful collaborators
media:group.media:description: CNN's Fareed Zakaria says the system of checks and balances in the US government is only effective if other leaders speak out and act when they see blatant abuses of power. #CNN #News

media:group.media:description:
CNN's Jake Tapper examines various incidents of police brutality caught on camera amid protests following the death of George Floyd.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Tapper presses Ben Carson on Trump's retweet about George Floyd

media:group.media:title: Tapper presses Ben Carson on Trump's retweet about George Floyd
media:group.media:description: CNN's Jake Tapper questions Secretary of Housing and Urban Development Ben Carson on a retweet by President Trump which criticized George Floyd following his death. #CNN #News
